title: U.S. investment banking : Number of establishments and employees
summary: The given chart is of multi-line type with 2 lines namely Establishments, and Employees. The y axis represents Number in thousands and the x axis represents Year.
Overall Employees is gradually decreasing, Establishments is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The lines ordered according to average values of Number in thousands in descending order is: 1. Employees, and lastly, 2. Establishments.
Throughout the period, Employees generally had the highest Number in thousands relative to others with an average of 148.0, and it reached its maximum at 2007 with a value of 184.0.
The botommost line, Establishments,  has a mean of 6.58, and peaked at 2007.

max_summary: The given chart is of multi-line type with 2 lines namely Establishments, and Employees. The y axis represents Number in thousands and the x axis represents Year.
Overall Employees is gradually decreasing, Establishments is roughly constant,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Employees, and lastly, 2. Establishments.
Throughout the period, Employees generally had the highest Number in thousands relative to others with an average of 148.0, and it reached its maximum at 2007 with a value of 184.0.
Establishments mostly had the least Number in thousands with a mean value of 6.58, which peaked at 2007 with a value of 9.3.
The minimum Number in thousands about 4.5, occured at 2008 by Establishments.
The difference of Number in thousands between Establishments and Employees is smaller at Year 2009 compared to the Year 2006.
